This week we announced the release of a brand new Daedalus, our mainnet wallet for Cardano. Daedalus 1.0.0 is our best yet, a huge upgrade, faster and more featured. All built on the new Haskell codebase + your feedback from our Daedalus Flight program  https://t.co/tECGNz63Ef

#Daedalus 1.0.0 is out and users enjoy it. The source code audit proved that #Cardano will be a secure network. We are approaching to #Shelley main-net. Not slowly but fast.  Read how the transition to the #main-net will happen:  https://t.co/dpn8lf59CY  #crypto $ADA #blockchain
